bwwExcerpt: As much as I liked it at City Center, it was still coming together at the time, which was not surprising in light of the complexity of the score, shaded characters, and limited rehearsal time. On Broadway, the production is much sharper and the performances are more nuanced. It's hard to pick and choose favorites among the cast because everyone is so damn good, including Julia Lester's sly and confident Little Red, Patina Miller's striking and sexy Witch, Phillipa Soo's heartfelt Cinderella, Col
